snippet.title: Super Mario Odyssey DS - NFGD 2022 Trailer
snippet.description:
This trailer was shown during the Nintendo Fan Game Direct 2022 that you can find here : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dPRaePoZN50

The goal of this project is to remake Super Mario Odyssey but on the DS. It's not supposed to be a perfect recreation of the original game but more a mix between Mario Odyssey and Super Mario 64 DS.

If you want to follow the progress I'm making on this, I often make updates on the discord server.
The official Odyssey DS discord server : https://discord.com/invite/hETMCSAT2B

MUSIC USED :
https://youtu.be/CYuMqcSRJiw
https://youtu.be/vwfQSJMkoUk
